title: Pure Vegetarian - Total Vegetarian
description: Food stall in Chinatown Market Plaza next to the Adelaide Central market. Offers Taiwanese style vegan food. Combo meal comes with rice or noodle plus a glass of soy drink (hot/cold). On the menu are items like curry puffs, vegetable curry, sweet and sour gluten, spicy eggplant, deep fried pumpkin, ribbon mock fish fillet, fried hokkien noodle, fried rice vermicelli, mapo tofu, and Southeast Asian desserts. Busy on weekdays during lunch. All vegan as of April 2012. Reported still operating as of Jan 2016.
streetAddress: Shop 8, Market Plaza Food Court, Moonta St
